section.title: &slsa; Compute Node Installation Overview
section.para: &product; supports &slsa; compute nodes, specifically &cloudos;. &vendor; does not ship a SLES ISO with &productname; so you will need to download a copy of the &slsa; ISO (SLE-12-SP3-Server-DVD-x86_64-GM-DVD1.iso) and the &slsa; SDK ISO (SLE-12-SP3-SDK-DVD-x86_64-GM-DVD1.iso) from &suse;. You can use the following link to download the ISO. To do so, either log in or create a &suse; account before downloading: .
There are two approaches for deploying &slsa; compute nodes in &productname;:

listitem.para: Using the &clm; to automatically deploy &slsa; Compute Nodes.
Provisioning &slsa; nodes yourself, either manually or using a third-party tool, and then providing the relevant information to the &clm;.

section.para: These two approaches can be used whether you are installing a cloud for the first time or adding a compute node to an existing cloud. Regardless of your approach, you should be certain to register your &slsa; compute nodes in order to get product updates as they come available. For more information, see .
